mn106:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kurūsu viharati kammāsadhammaṃ nāma kurūnaṃ nigamo.
mn106:4.3: Ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā, ye ca samparāyikā kāmā;
mn106:4.4: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā kāmasaññā—
mn106:4.5: ubhayametaṃ māradheyyaṃ, mārassesa visayo, mārassesa nivāpo, mārassesa gocaro.
mn106:4.6: Etthete pāpakā akusalā mānasā abhijjhāpi byāpādāpi sārambhāpi saṃvattanti.
mn106:4.9: ‘ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā, ye ca samparāyikā kāmā;
mn106:4.10: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā kāmasaññā—
mn106:4.11: ubhayametaṃ māradheyyaṃ, mārassesa visayo, mārassesa nivāpo, mārassesa gocaro.
mn106:4.12: Etthete pāpakā akusalā mānasā abhijjhāpi byāpādāpi sārambhāpi saṃvattanti, teva ariyasāvakassa idhamanusikkhato antarāyāya sambhavanti.
mn106:4.13: Yannūnāhaṃ vipulena mahaggatena cetasā vihareyyaṃ abhibhuyya lokaṃ adhiṭṭhāya manasā.
mn106:4.14: Vipulena hi me mahaggatena cetasā viharato abhibhuyya lokaṃ adhiṭṭhāya manasā ye pāpakā akusalā mānasā abhijjhāpi byāpādāpi sārambhāpi te na bhavissanti.
mn106:4.15: Tesaṃ pahānā aparittañca me cittaṃ bhavissati appamāṇaṃ subhāvitan’ti.
mn106:4.16: Tassa evaṃpaṭipannassa tabbahulavihārino āyatane cittaṃ pasīdati.
mn106:4.17: Sampasāde sati etarahi vā āneñjaṃ samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā.
mn106:4.18: Ṭhānametaṃ vijjati yaṃ taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ viññāṇaṃ assa āneñjūpagaṃ.
mn106:4.19: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamā āneñjasappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati.
mn106:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn106:5.2: ‘ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā, ye ca samparāyikā kāmā;
mn106:5.3: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā kāmasaññā;
mn106:5.4: yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ cattāri ca mahābhūtāni, catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpan’ti.
mn106:5.5: Tassa evaṃpaṭipannassa tabbahulavihārino āyatane cittaṃ pasīdati.
mn106:5.6: Sampasāde sati etarahi vā āneñjaṃ samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā.
mn106:5.7: Ṭhānametaṃ vijjati yaṃ taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ viññāṇaṃ assa āneñjūpagaṃ.
mn106:5.8: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyā āneñjasappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati.
mn106:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn106:6.2: ‘ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā, ye ca samparāyikā kāmā;
mn106:6.3: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā kāmasaññā;
mn106:6.4: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpā, ye ca samparāyikā rūpā;
mn106:6.5: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā rūpasaññā—
mn106:6.7: Yadaniccaṃ taṃ nālaṃ abhinandituṃ, nālaṃ abhivadituṃ, nālaṃ ajjhositun’ti.
mn106:6.8: Tassa evaṃpaṭipannassa tabbahulavihārino āyatane cittaṃ pasīdati.
mn106:6.9: Sampasāde sati etarahi vā āneñjaṃ samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā.
mn106:6.10: Ṭhānametaṃ vijjati yaṃ taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ viññāṇaṃ assa āneñjūpagaṃ.
mn106:6.11: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyā āneñjasappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati.
mn106:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn106:7.2: ‘ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā, ye ca samparāyikā kāmā;
mn106:7.3: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā kāmasaññā;
mn106:7.4: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpā, ye ca samparāyikā rūpā;
mn106:7.5: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā rūpasaññā;
mn106:7.8: Yatthetā aparisesā nirujjhanti etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītaṃ—
mn106:7.10: Tassa evaṃpaṭipannassa tabbahulavihārino āyatane cittaṃ pasīdati.
mn106:7.11: Sampasāde sati etarahi vā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā.
mn106:7.12: Ṭhānametaṃ vijjati yaṃ taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ viññāṇaṃ assa ākiñcaññāyatanūpagaṃ.
mn106:7.13: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamā ākiñcaññāyatanasappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati.
mn106:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn106:8.3: Tassa evaṃpaṭipannassa tabbahulavihārino āyatane cittaṃ pasīdati.
mn106:8.4: Sampasāde sati etarahi vā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā.
mn106:8.5: Ṭhānametaṃ vijjati yaṃ taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ viññāṇaṃ assa ākiñcaññāyatanūpagaṃ.
mn106:8.6: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyā ākiñcaññāyatanasappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati.
mn106:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn106:9.2: ‘nāhaṃ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasmiṃ, na ca mama kvacani kismiñci kiñcanaṃ natthī’ti.
mn106:9.3: Tassa evaṃpaṭipannassa tabbahulavihārino āyatane cittaṃ pasīdati.
mn106:9.4: Sampasāde sati etarahi vā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā.
mn106:9.5: Ṭhānametaṃ vijjati yaṃ taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ viññāṇaṃ assa ākiñcaññāyatanūpagaṃ.
mn106:9.6: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyā ākiñcaññāyatanasappāyā paṭipadā akkhāyati.
mn106:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn106:10.2: ‘ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā, ye ca samparāyikā kāmā;
mn106:10.3: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā kāmasaññā;
mn106:10.4: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpā, ye ca samparāyikā rūpā;
mn106:10.5: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā rūpasaññā;
mn106:10.6: yā ca āneñjasaññā, yā ca ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā—
mn106:10.8: Yatthetā aparisesā nirujjhanti etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītaṃ—
mn106:10.10: Tassa evaṃpaṭipannassa tabbahulavihārino āyatane cittaṃ pasīdati.
mn106:10.11: Sampasāde sati etarahi vā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjati paññāya vā adhimuccati kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā.
mn106:10.12: Ṭhānametaṃ vijjati yaṃ taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ viññāṇaṃ assa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagaṃ.
mn106:11.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn106:11.8: Parinibbāyeyya nu kho so, bhante, bhikkhu na vā parinibbāyeyyā”ti?
mn106:11.9: “Apetthekacco, ānanda, bhikkhu parinibbāyeyya, apetthekacco bhikkhu na parinibbāyeyyā”ti.
mn106:11.10: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yenapetthekacco bhikkhu parinibbāyeyya, apetthekacco bhikkhu na parinibbāyeyyā”ti?
mn106:11.17: So taṃ upekkhaṃ abhinandati, abhivadati, ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn106:11.18: Tassa taṃ upekkhaṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato tannissitaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ tadupādānaṃ.
mn106:11.19: Saupādāno, ānanda, bhikkhu na parinibbāyatī”ti. “
mn106:11.20: Kahaṃ pana so, bhante, bhikkhu upādiyamāno upādiyatī”ti?
mn106:11.22: “Upādānaseṭṭhaṃ kira so, bhante, bhikkhu upādiyamāno upādiyatī”ti?
mn106:12.7: So taṃ upekkhaṃ nābhinandati, nābhivadati, na ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn106:12.8: Tassa taṃ upekkhaṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato na tannissitaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ na tadupādānaṃ.
mn106:13.2: Nissāya nissāya kira no, bhante, bhagavatā oghassa nittharaṇā akkhātā.
mn106:13.5: ‘ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā, ye ca samparāyikā kāmā;
mn106:13.6: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā kāmasaññā;
mn106:13.7: ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpā, ye ca samparāyikā rūpā;
mn106:13.8: yā ca diṭṭhadhammikā rūpasaññā, yā ca samparāyikā rūpasaññā;
mn106:13.9: yā ca āneñjasaññā, yā ca ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā, yā ca nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññā—
mn106:13.11: Etaṃ amataṃ yadidaṃ anupādā cittassa vimokkho.
mn106:13.12: Iti, kho, ānanda, desitā mayā āneñjasappāyā paṭipadā, desitā ākiñcaññāyatanasappāyā paṭipadā, desitā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasappāyā paṭipadā, desitā nissāya nissāya oghassa nittharaṇā, desito ariyo vimokkho.
mn106:13.13: Yaṃ kho, ānanda, satthārā karaṇīyaṃ sāvakānaṃ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṃ upādāya, kataṃ vo taṃ mayā.
mn106:13.15: Jhāyathānanda, mā pamādattha, mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha.
mn106:14.2: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
